snippet: Didier Deschamps, France’s coach, sued Anara Atanes, the partner of Samir Nasri, over foul-mouthed comments posted to Twitter after Nasri was left off the World Cup squad.
abstract: French soccer coach Didier Deschamps sues Anara Atanes, partner of Samir Nasri, over foul-mouthed comments posted to Twitter after Nasiri was left off the World Cup squad.
lead_paragraph: Didier Deschamps, France’s coach, sued Anara Atanes, the partner of Samir Nasri, over foul-mouthed comments posted to Twitter after Nasri was left off the World Cup squad.
